content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Cable Factory at Position (2.5, 17.5)
Consists of:
- Cable factory input chest at Position(x=2.5, y=17.5)
- New factory burner inserter placed at Position(x=3.5, y=17.5) using direction RIGHT
- Auxiliary factory burner inserter retrieved at Position(x=2.5, y=16.5)
- Assembling machine at Position(x=1.5, y=19.5)
Use-case: Facilitates copper plate processing into copper cable.

### Wooden Chest Belt Depot at Position (3.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest serving as the belt depot at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5)
- Dedicated transport belt segment placed at Position(x=4.5, y=15.5) adjacent to the chest
- Depot burner inserter placed at Position(x=3.5, y=14.5) using direction UP
Use-case: Acts as an isolated target for multi-segment belt routing from the extraction system.


ERROR TIPS

- Transport Belt Connection Errors:
  • When connecting transport belts, ensure the target is not a Prototype.SteamEngine. Use an inserter as an intermediary to input items into the engine.

- Placement Range Error:
  • Confirm the player is within the maximum allowed distance (10 units) from the target position before attempting to place an entity.

- Inventory Shortage Error:
  • Verify that the required item (e.g., wooden chest) is present in the inventory prior to placement.

- Undefined Variable Error:
  • Check that all variables (such as 'target_chest') are correctly defined and assigned before use to avoid reference errors.
